index.sql: Select collectionobjectcatalog.CatalogNumber, taxonname.TaxonName From collectionobject Inner Join collectionobjectcatalog ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = collectionobjectcatalog.CollectionObjectCatalogID Inner Join determination ON determination.BiologicalObjectID = collectionobjectcatalog.CollectionObjectCatalogID Inner Join taxonname ON taxonname.TaxonNameID = determination.TaxonNameID Where collectionobjectcatalog.SubNumber = '0'

detailView.sql: Select CatalogNumber from collectionobjectcatalog where CatalogNumber in (%s)
select localityname,Latitude1,Longitude1 from locality where LocalityID in (%s)
select County,State,Country from geography where GeographyID in (%s)
select TaxonNameID,TaxonName from taxonname where TaxonNameID in (%s)
select AgentID,FirstName,LastName from agent where AgentID in (%s)
select address,city,state from address where AddressID in (%s)

index.sql: Select determination.BiologicalObjectID, agent.FirstName, agent.LastName From determination Inner Join agent ON determination.DeterminerID = agent.AgentID where determination.current1 <> 0

detailView.sql: select * from (Select taxonname.TaxonName, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, collectionobjectcatalog.CollectionObjectCatalogID From collectionobject Inner Join collectionobjectcatalog ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = collectionobjectcatalog.CollectionObjectCatalogID Inner Join determination ON determination.BiologicalObjectID = collectionobjectcatalog.CollectionObjectCatalogID Inner Join agent ON determination.DeterminerID = agent.AgentID Inner Join taxonname ON determination.TaxonNameID = taxonname.TaxonNameID where determination.current1 <> 0) as tx where tx.CollectionObjectCatalogID in (%s)

index.sql: Select collectingevent.CollectingEventID, locality.NamedPlace, locality.LocalityName, locality.Township, locality.Section From collectingevent Inner Join locality ON collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID

detailView.sql: Select collectingevent.CollectingEventID, locality.LocalityName From collectingevent Inner Join locality ON collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID where collectingevent.CollectingEventID in (%s)
